casebody.data:
Larry Onvisi OMODIA, Plaintiff-Appellant v. Michael B. MUKASEY, U.S. Attorney General; Michael Chertoff, Secretary, Department of Homeland Security; Kenneth Landgrebe, Director of Detention & Removal, Defendants-Appellees. No. 07-20898

Summary Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 3, 2008. Larry Onvisi Omodia, Houston, TX, for Plaintiff-Appellant.

Before WIENER, GARZA, and BENAVIDES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM: *

AFFIRMED. See Rule 47.6.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
